fullplot: John Heard came back from the war minus an eye, a leg and an arm. He drinks a lot and abuses his wife, who also drinks a lot. Jeff Bridges is a friend who witnesses a murder. From this point John is "after" the killer, along side the diseased sister, while Jeff doesn't really want to get involved in it.
plot: Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.
title: Cutter's Way
